code: import React from'react';import{Github}from'lucide-react';import'./FloatingGitHub.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FloatingGitHub=()=>{const githubRepo=process.env.REACT_APP_GITHUB_REPO;if(!githubRepo){return null;}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:githubRepo,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"floating-github",title:"Ver c\xF3digo en GitHub","aria-label":"Ver c\xF3digo en GitHub",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Github,{size:24})});};export default FloatingGitHub;
